import { X } from "react-feather"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; const StatusSection = (props) => { const status = useSelector((state) => state.user.userStatus); const currentUser = useSelector((state) => state.user.currentUser); var text = currentUser; var loggedInUser = text.split("@")[0]; console.log("status", status, currentUser); const closeLeftSide = () => { document.querySelector(".status-tab").classList.remove("active"); document.querySelector(".recent-default").classList.add("active"); props.ActiveTab(""); }; return (

{currentUser != null ? loggedInUser : "No Logged USer"}

{status}

closeLeftSide()} >
